title: Support not working
body:
Cannot sign into support or check my existing tickets.

Edit: Support link is working again.

replies.body: I'm having trouble logging into support, too. Any time I try to log into support to create a ticket or Ask Riot, it immediately logs me out and boots me out to an error page.
We had a service incident with our support platform that was resolved shortly after it began. If you're still having issues logging into the Riot Support site, let me know.
Do you know how to solve the issue? I currently cannot access my current tickets.

Thanks for the reply! Fortunately, the support link started working again. So I can sign in and check up on the tickets. 

Sorry, should have updated the post so you didn't have to waste your time.
Me neither, when I click submit request nothing happens, it just reloads the current page. Same thing when clicking sign in or view tickets. Help rito pls.
